EmailTemplate.name: 18-TEPS-Energy-Email-nurture Utilities-T0021Q.Stream 1_Email 6_Right time
EmailTemplate.subject: The bottom-line solution for smart-grid migration
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Achieve grid efficiency, reliability, and safety Maximize return, minimize risk You want to communicate with the grid more reliably and efficiently but is the time right to upgrade your network? And, can you do it cost-effectively? The Nokia IP/MPLS solutions deliver field-proven support for legacy applications <[[https://pages.nokia.com/T0021L_LP2.html?did=d000000000e1&utm_campaign=utilities_moderniz.&utm_source=nurture&utm_medium=email&utm_content=why-it]]> and next-generation IP and Ethernet-based grid applications - all on a single, secure, reliable and adaptive network. © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia.
Nokia: Karaportti 3, 2610 Espoo, Finland Contact Us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> · Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> · Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/]]> <[[https://www.linkedin.com/]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/]]> <[[https://www.youtube.com/]]> <[[https://networks.nokia.com]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia's networks business or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
